positions.companyName: Donald J. Trump for President, Inc.
positions.title: Immigration Advisor

positions.description:
Writer, researcher, and subject matter expert on numerous immigration topics from Deferred Action to birthright citizenship. Has testified before Congress and published editorials in The Washington Times, The Daily Caller, The National Interest, The Christian Science Monitor, and U.S. News & World Report, among others. Has appeared on Fox News, MSNBC, PBS News Hour, C-SPAN, and regularly provides commentary for radio shows throughout the country. Extensively quoted in print media from Breitbart to the Associated Press and a contributor at TheHill.com

Author of many detailed reports, strategist on policy implementation and messaging of nearly every immigration issue. Full bio available at: http://cis.org/Feere

The Center for Immigration Studies is an independent, non-partisan, non-profit, research organization. Since its founding in 1985, the Center has pursued a single mission â providing immigration policymakers, the academic community, news media, and concerned citizens with reliable information about the social, economic, environmental, security, and fiscal consequences of legal and illegal immigration into the United States.
